00020 
00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 using System.Text.RegularExpressions;
00026 
00027 using Niry;
00028 using Niry.Utils;
00029 using Niry.Network;
00030 
00031 using NyFolder;
00032 using NyFolder.GUI;
00033 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00034 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00035 
00036 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.AccountRegistration {
00038     public class RegistrationDialog : GladeDialog {
00039         // ============================================
00040         // PRIVATE Members
00041         // ============================================
00042         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Button buttonCheckAvailability;
00043         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Entry entryPasswordCheck;
00044         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Label labelPassMatch;
00045         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Label labelStrength;
00046         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Entry entryUserName;
00047         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Entry entryPassword;
00048         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Entry entryMail;
00049         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Image image;
00050 
00051         // ============================================
00052         // PUBLIC Constructors
00053         // ============================================
00055         public RegistrationDialog() : 
00056             base("dialog", new Glade.XML(null, "RegistrationDialog.glade", "dialog", null))
00057         {
00058             // Initialize Dialog Image
00059             this.image.Pixbuf = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("Registration");
00060 
00061             // Initialize Events
00062             entryPassword.Changed += new EventHandler(OnPasswordChanged);
00063             entryPasswordCheck.Changed += new EventHandler(OnPasswordCheckChanged);
00064             buttonCheckAvailability.Clicked += new EventHandler(OnCheckAvailability);
00065         }
00066 
00067         // ============================================
00068         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handler
00069         // ============================================
00070         private void OnPasswordChanged (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00071             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00072                 labelStrength.Markup = "<b>" + PasswordType(entryPassword.Text) + "</b>";
00073             });
00074         }
00075 
00076         private void OnPasswordCheckChanged (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00077             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00078                 if (entryPassword.Text != entryPasswordCheck.Text) {
00079                     labelPassMatch.Markup = "<b>Don't Match</b>";
00080                 } else {
00081                     labelPassMatch.Markup = "<b>Match</b>";
00082                 }
00083             });
00084         }
00085 
00086         private void OnCheckAvailability (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00087             if (TextUtils.IsEmpty(entryUserName.Text) == true)
00088                 return;
00089 
00090             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00091                 try {
00092                     string resp = HttpRequest.UserNameIsAvailable(entryUserName.Text);
00093                     GUI.Base.Dialogs.MessageError("UserName Availability", resp);
00094                 } catch (Exception e) {
00095                     GUI.Base.Dialogs.MessageError("UserName Availability", e.Message);
00096                     Console.WriteLine(e.StackTrace);
00097                 }
00098             });
00099         }
00100 
00101         // ============================================
00102         // PRIVATE Methods
00103         // ============================================
00104         private int PasswordStrength (string password) {
00105             int strength = 0;
00106             string[] patterns = new string[] {
00107                 "[a-z]", "[A-Z]", "[0-9]"
00108             };
00109 
00110             foreach (string pattern in patterns) {
00111                 if (Regex.IsMatch(password, pattern))
00112                     strength++;
00113             }
00114 
00115             return(strength);
00116         }
00117 
00118         private string PasswordType (string password) {
00119             string[] type = new string[] {
00120                 "weak", "not weak", "acceptable", "strong"
00121             };
00122             return(type[PasswordStrength(password)]);
00123         }
00124 
00125         // ============================================
00126         // PUBLIC Properties
00127         // ============================================
00129         public string Username {
00130             set { entryUserName.Text = value; }
00131             get { return(TextUtils.IsEmpty(entryUserName.Text) ? null : entryUserName.Text); }
00132         }
00133 
00135         public string Password {
00136             get { return(TextUtils.IsEmpty(entryPassword.Text) ? null : entryPassword.Text); }
00137         }
00138 
00140         public string EMail {
00141             get { return(TextUtils.IsEmpty(entryMail.Text) ? null : entryMail.Text); }
00142         }
00143     }
00144 }
